Description:

ᴅᴀɴᴄᴇ ɪɴꜰᴏ: You only need your hands to participate in scoring, FBT is optional!

ꜱᴏɴɢ ᴄʜᴏɪᴄᴇꜱ: You are welcome to do whatever songs you want, please touch the star to request a song! If no one requests a song, I will be going down the list alphabetically!

ᴅᴀɴᴄᴇ ʀᴇQᴜɪʀᴇᴍᴇɴᴛꜱ:
-Bring WATER! Drink a lot of it
-Turn your fan on or thermostat down. I know, I know, normally you cant touch it, but for this event you can.
-Make sure nothing is within punching distance!

This is preceded by Introvert & Newbie Game Night and afterwards is Chillin in a Group+

Instructions on How to Get to the Event:

1.) Join MondoCat Discord - http://discord.gg/mondocat
2.) Fill out the smol form in https://discordapp.com/channels/676165028168204338/1093778151785644042
3.) Join the VRC Group - https://vrc.group/CAT.0394
4.) Join group instance at that time! It will be posted in https://discordapp.com/channels/676165028168204338/1166434756276269076 when the instance is up.
5.) (Optional) Sign up for the event to get notified in DMs when it's live - https://discordapp.com/channels/676165028168204338/995834340837687317
